title: How to unsubscribe from Glovo Prime
description: Glovo Prime is a monthly subscription service that offers unlimited free deliveries and exclusive promotions. You can cancel your subscription at any time through the Glovo app or website.

steps_1.title: Unsubscribe via Glovo App
steps_1.description:
To cancel your Glovo Prime subscription through the app, follow these steps:

*   Open the Glovo app and log in.
*   Go to your profile (usually an icon in the upper left corner).
*   Find "Glovo Prime" or "Subscriptions".
*   Select "Manage subscription".
*   Tap "Unsubscribe" or "Cancel Glovo Prime".
*   Confirm your cancellation.

steps_2.title: Unsubscribe via Glovo Website
steps_2.description:
To cancel your Glovo Prime subscription through the website, follow these steps:

*   Go to the Glovo website and log in.
*   Go to your user profile (usually at the top right).
*   Look for the “Glovo Prime” or “Subscriptions” section.
*   Select the option "Manage subscription" and click “Unsubscribe.”
*   Follow the confirmation process and make sure you receive the notification.

steps_3.title: Remove Payment Methods (Optional)
steps_3.description:
To avoid future charges, you can remove your payment methods from your account:

*   Go to the "Payment Methods" section of your profile.

seo_text: Cancel your Glovo Prime subscription quickly and easily. Follow our step-by-step guide to unsubscribe from Glovo Prime through the app or website. Avoid future charges by removing your payment information.
